title: Warm Sweet Potato & Chickpea Salad
description: Hearty roasted sweet potato and chickpea salad with tahini dressing, perfect for meal prep
ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled & cubed (about 1" pieces)
⅓ cup feta or goat cheese crumbles
1 tbsp lemon juice (plus more to taste)
1 tbsp warm water (more as needed to thin)
1 small garlic clove, minced or grated
instructions: Toss cubed sweet potatoes & chickpeas with olive oil, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Spread evenly on a baking sheet. Roast 20–25 minutes, flipping halfway, until sweet potatoes are tender and edges are browned.
While roasting, put chopped kale in a large bowl. Drizzle with 1 tsp olive oil & a pinch of salt. Massage with your hands for ~1 min until it softens and darkens.
In a small jar or bowl, whisk tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and warm water until smooth. Adjust consistency—should be pourable.
Add roasted sweet potatoes & chickpeas to the kale. Toss with dressing while still warm.
Top with feta or goat cheese crumbles and serve warm.
notes: Keeps 4 days in fridge, keep dressing separate if storing more than 1 day. Optional upgrades: Add roasted red peppers or caramelized onions for sweetness, sprinkle pumpkin seeds for crunch, or swap feta for shaved parmesan if you want it saltier.
